spiritsExplanation:
The workout video "10 Minute Guided Breathwork For Stress & Anxiety I Feel Calm and Focused" is primarily characterized by the 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit. The title highlights 'calm' and 'focused,' which suggests a relaxing and stress-relieving session. The description emphasizes the stress reduction and focus-enhancing qualities of breathwork, aiming for relaxation and mental clarity, further reinforcing the restorative nature. Additionally, comments reflect its effectiveness in reducing anxiety and improving well-being, supporting a high score of 0.9 for this spirit.

The 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit is also relevant, as the channel description mentions breathing exercises infused with rhythmic music, suggesting a mind-body connection element and smooth coordination of breaths, meriting a score of 0.6. Other spirits like 'High-Energy & Intense' or 'Sport & Agility' are clearly not applicable, as the session focuses more on relaxation and mindfulness than intensity or athleticism.
